blogPost.excerpt: TeamTime is the simplest, most streamlined and secure time logging tool (mobile & web) designed specifically for https://basecamp.com users. We created it for https://www.clearbluedesign.com/ourselves after struggling with other tools out there. We share it with you.
blogPost.body: TeamTime is the simplest, most streamlined and secure time logging tool (mobile & web) designed specifically for https://basecamp.com users. We created it for https://www.clearbluedesign.com/ourselves after struggling with other tools out there. We share it with you.
blogPost.title: TeamTime for Basecamp - Time tracking for teams using Basecamp
blogPost.author: Petr Filipchyk

localize.description: TeamTime是专门为https://basecamp.com 用户设计的最简单、最精简、最安全的时间记录工具（移动和网络）。我们在与其他工具斗争后，为https://www.clearbluedesign.com/ourselves 创建了它。我们把它与你分享。
localize.tagline: 使用Basecamp的团队的时间跟踪

localize.description: TeamTime是專門爲https://basecamp.com 用戶設計的最簡單、最精簡、最安全的時間記錄工具（移動和網絡）。我們在與其他工具鬥爭後，爲https://www.clearbluedesign.com/ourselves 創建了它。我們把它與你分享。
localize.tagline: 使用Basecamp的團隊的時間跟蹤

next.title: There's only inflation in things we spend money on. Otherwise, nothing. https://t.co/ZBltdtpHKK

localize.full_text: 只有我们花钱买的东西才会有通货膨胀。否则，什么都没有。https://t.co/ZBltdtpHKK
只有我們花錢買的東西纔會有通貨膨脹。否則，什麼都沒有。https://t.co/ZBltdtpHKK
